title: bobyben
author: bobyben
created_time: September 13, 2023, 06:13:01 PMLast edit: December 31, 2023, 11:20:09 AM by bobyben
content: Web3 gaming platform is a product that allows users to run their own gaming platform by web3 with more than 20 games online and chat. This product does not need an admin and everything works with smart contracts. Users can enjoy playing various games such as Crash, poker, blackjak, dice, and more with other players from around the world. They can also chat with each other in real time using a secure and encrypted messaging system. Updated + (Decentralized Poker - A new poker game that integrates Web3 technology)Contact for Demo 50% Offer until 31 APR 2024Web3 gaming platform is built with react, mongodb and solidity, which are popular and powerful technologies for web development and blockchain programming. Web3 gaming platform is a decentralized and trustless way to play and chat online, without relying on any third-party intermediaries or servers. Users can have full control over their own data, funds, and gaming experience. Web3 gaming platform is a revolutionary product that combines the fun of gaming with the benefits of web3.You can see price & demo & more :https://cashcode.store/product/web3-unlimited-casino/Email : xwebking@yahoo.com ,            hello@cashcode.storePoker Multiplayer dApp base on evm compatible is ready contact for demo and more .Video demo is available now.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: What is your relationship with the platform? you should state in your thread if you're an affiliate, the script creator, or the admin of the platform, and why use Yahoo for communication There should be a dedicated email configuration specifically for buyers like Code:seller@domainname.com or Code:inquiry@domainname.com.

comments.author: bobyben
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on September 13, 2023, 11:48:17 PMWhat is your relationship with the platform? you should state in your thread if you're an affiliate, the script creator, or the admin of the platform, and why use Yahoo for communication There should be a dedicated email configuration specifically for buyers like Code:seller@domainname.com or Code:inquiry@domainname.com.Thank you for your information and opinionOrganizational email was inserted in the topic.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I like the fact that you made available your link to access your website for site seeing and demo as well. So far from what I have seen, you got good and well designed script for sale and I think it it would attract investors and potential buyers to your site for business but I was wondering how you could deal with the payment aspect of it because I am very much sure nobody here would want to take such risk to make payment when you have no reputation here. As it is now, scams are very much on the increase and as such everyone wants to be sure of what they are getting involved with. S ok therefore I believe members here would want to opt for an escrow for transparency and accountability which I believe you know that otherwise nobody would be comfortable to pay for anything here when they do not know whom they are dealing with. And this website or yours too has no one to vouch for it and possibly I guess it is a new website and lastly, just as you have been asked before by a poster here, It would be nice you tell or make known your connection or stand with what you are introducing here to the community.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Did you build this yourself, or did you build it with a team? (So community knows what role you had in this tech)Are you one of the primary coders/developers or are you re-selling work that you paid for or acquired somehow else? (To ensure you are legitimate)Do you provide a service for technical/code support, patches etc. after you have sold to someone? (To ensure that buyers aren't left in the dark)What operates via the backend, what operates via the frontend, what operates in the smart contract? (To know how decentralized it really is)Will you accept an escrow? I think answers to all of these questions are vital if you want a serious buyer. Also, this should be moved to Services or Digital goods (since it's premade, finished software).

Thank you for your feedback and your interest in my website and script. I appreciate your concern about the payment aspect and the reputation of my website. I understand that scams are very common and that you want to be sure of what you are getting involved with. Let me address your questions and doubts.We are willing to use an escrow service for the payment process and have no problem with that. we want to ensure that both parties are satisfied and protected. Also can use any reputable escrow service that you prefer or suggest.

comments.author: bobyben
comments.body: Quote from: BenCodie on September 14, 2023, 10:24:26 AMDid you build this yourself, or did you build it with a team? (So community knows what role you had in this tech)Are you one of the primary coders/developers or are you re-selling work that you paid for or acquired somehow else? (To ensure you are legitimate)Do you provide a service for technical/code support, patches etc. after you have sold to someone? (To ensure that buyers aren't left in the dark)What operates via the backend, what operates via the frontend, what operates in the smart contract? (To know how decentralized it really is)Will you accept an escrow? I think answers to all of these questions are vital if you want a serious buyer. Also, this should be moved to Services or Digital goods (since it's premade, finished software).Thank you for your interest in dApp game script. I will try to answer your questions as best as I can.- We built this game script our team, using our own skills and knowledge.We are the sole creator and owner of this game script.- We are one of the primary coders/developers of this game script. we did not re-sell or acquire any work from others. Everything in this game script is original and authentic.-We do provide a service for technical/code support, patches, etc. after have sold to someone. - The game operates via a combination of backend (mongo, API,s ,..), frontend (ReactJs), and smart contract (solidity). The backend handles the logic and data of the game, such as the rules, the scores, the rewards, etc. The frontend handles the user interface and interaction of the game, such as the graphics, the sounds, the buttons, etc. The smart contract handles the transactions and verification of the game, such as the payments, the ownership, the fairness, etc.I hope this answers your questions and gives you a clear idea of what my game script is about. If you have any more questions or want to buy my game script, please contact me via Yahoo at xwebking@yahoo.com or website : cashcode.store. Thank you for your time and attention.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: The product is cheap because they are not the creators and are likely a third-party seller of the scripts and products that they are selling on their platformhttps://cashcode.store/faq/ QuoteWhy do products cost less than developers?We do not provide license keys and not free updates for the products you downloaded. We are not developers of the provided products, so our technical support capabilities are limited. We do not change the functionality of products and do not fix developer bugs.Where can I find the license key for the purchased product?We do not provide any licensing or trial/commercial keys when you purchase digital products.So buyers should read the FAQ first and understand what they are getting, they do not have documentation of the script so you are at a loss in case there is a bug and they need a patch.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: I just visited the demo version of your web3 casino but it took like a minute to enter to it, maybe the issue with the hosting server of your demo or the script itself. Beside that and talking about the script itself with that price it’s really and abuse price seeing that most of the pictures and icons used are copied from other casinos like bc.game, the quality also of these pictures are so bad and the example is with the roulette game the rolling picture is very low. When i clicked on connect wallet nothing happens and I’m not sure if it’s because of the demo version or it’s not working on mobile.This is only my opinion an I would like to day that with the price mentioned you should upgrade a lot of things, and add a smart contract auditing with a trusted service or company to verify if there’s no malicious codes with the contracts as it’s the most important thing with web3 casinos and applications.

comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on September 14, 2023, 01:06:26 PMI just visited the demo version of your web3 casino but it took like a minute to enter to it, maybe the issue with the hosting server of your demo or the script itself. Beside that and talking about the script itself with that price it’s really and abuse price seeing that most of the pictures and icons used are copied from other casinos like bc.game, the quality also of these pictures are so bad and the example is with the roulette game the rolling picture is very low. When i clicked on connect wallet nothing happens and I’m not sure if it’s because of the demo version or it’s not working on mobile.This is only my opinion an I would like to day that with the price mentioned you should upgrade a lot of things, and add a smart contract auditing with a trusted service or company to verify if there’s no malicious codes with the contracts as it’s the most important thing with web3 casinos and applications.Thank you for your feedback and your interest in web3 casino script.  - First, the slow loading time of the demo version is due to the use of the developer server, which needs to upgrade resources. - Second, the images and icons used in the web3 casino script can be customized and changed. - Third, wallet connection feature works well on mobile devices.You can see the functionality and functionality of the web3 casino script by testing the demo version on the  website.   (In the future update of the script, WalletConnect v2 will be integrated) - Fourth, we have tested it extensively and rigorously on different platforms and devices.Coding best practices and standards have also been used to ensure that the web3 casino script is clean, efficient and reliable. - Fifth, smart contracts used in the project can be audited (Contact for more information)I hope this answers your feedback and clears your doubt.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: bobyben on September 14, 2023, 07:29:31 PMQuote from: SecuredNet on September 14, 2023, 06:55:51 PMhttps://codecanyon.net/item/dogelab-cloud-dogecoin-mining-platform/32573543     sell you nulleds script?No, not at all, it was probably imported from the original site template. - ModifiedBesides that dogelab-cloud mining platform you are also selling a nulled https://cashcode.store/product/wordpress-automatic-plugin/ This is the real plugin coming from the developer of the pluginhttps://codecanyon.net/item/wordpress-automatic-plugin/1904470 That is $34 cheaper There's a lot of risk in buying nulled scripts because scripts, plugins, and themes are frequently updated without a license you cannot update it and you will be left with scripts with a lot of bugs and patches, this is an unethical practice, I have a bad experience from using nulled scripts and these nulled scripts can also be requested free on blackhat forum.

comments.author: bobyben
comments.body: 🆕 New ProductPunchSale is a next generation web 3.0 launchpad that offers a platform for launching new projects in the web 3.0 space, such as NFT, gaming and DeFi applications. With PunchSale, users can create Presale tokens, Fair presales and Private sales with web3 and decentralized smart contracts that interact with multiple blockchains, such as Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon and more. PunchSale also allows users to join the presales and private sales of the most promising web 3.0 projects with ease and security.
